solution_line_template: Each liter of water holds {ml_per_liter} mL. Mary's goal is to drink {daily_water_liters} liters of water a day, which in mL is {daily_water_liters} L * {ml_per_liter} mL/L = <<{daily_water_liters}*{ml_per_liter}={daily_water_ml}>>{daily_water_ml} mL
To reach her goal, Mary should drink {daily_water_ml} mL / {glass_capacity_ml} mL/glass = <<{daily_water_ml}/{glass_capacity_ml}={num_glasses}>>{num_glasses} glasses of water per day.
